textBeforeTable: Cars & Parts If you have a Junk car that you are wanting to get rid of, give us a call. Robert will give you the best offer in town and we will come and pick it up for free within the Springfield area. B&W Auto Salvage is a trusted name when it comes to the Auto Salvage Industry. Providing quality parts has been B&Ws focus since its humble beginnings in Northwest Springfield. With one of the largest lots in the city of Springfield, B&W is sure to provide you with a large selection of parts for a wide variety of makes, models, and years. Providing quality new and used parts for 50 years. Welcome to B&W Auto Salvage!
